If you’re looking for things you can brew with hot water, like coffee powder, here are some great options:

☕ Caffeinated Brews

  • Coffee – ground coffee beans (espresso, drip, French press, etc.)
  • Instant Coffee – dissolves quickly in hot water
  • Tea – black, green, white, or oolong tea leaves
  • Yerba Mate – South American tea-like beverage

🍵 Herbal & Plant-Based Infusions

  • Herbal Tea – chamomile, peppermint, hibiscus, etc.
  • Ginger Tea – fresh ginger slices steeped in hot water
  • Lemon & Honey – great for soothing a sore throat
  • Turmeric Tea – turmeric powder or fresh root with hot water
  • Cinnamon Tea – cinnamon sticks steeped for a spicy kick

🍄 Unique Brews

  • Mushroom Coffee/Tea – made from dried medicinal mushrooms like chaga or lion’s mane
  • Barley Tea (Mugicha) – a popular roasted grain tea from Japan & Korea
  • Corn Silk Tea – a traditional brew made from dried corn silk
  • Rice Tea (Genmaicha) – a Japanese green tea with roasted rice

🥛 Other Hot Brews

  • Hot Cocoa Powder – just mix with water (or milk for extra creaminess)
  • Instant Soup Powders – like miso soup, broth, or hot chocolate mixes

Do you have something specific in mind, or are you just exploring new brewing ideas? 😃
